wikipedia_page.main: Nicola Haydn is an actress, director and playwright from Brighton. She trained at Rose Bruford College of Speech and Drama.

response: Barber made an appearance at the Brighton Fringe in 2012.Author's page. Retrieved 19 September 2019.Royal Literary Fund. Retrieved 19 September 2019. She and Nicola Haydn wrote a one-man stage adaptation of The Marlowe Papers performed in 2016.
The book was adapted as a play by Barber and Nicola Haydn, performed by Jamie Martin in 2016.
